product_name: REI  Arctic Pod +20 Sleeping Bag - Long - Special Buy
long_description: First time sleeping under the stars? Make a sound investment with the REI Arctic Pod 20 synthetic sleeping bag in a long length. It's feature-packed, built to last and priced for your budget.
